name: 10twelve
description:
Our agency is only as strong as the weakest link. Our crew has developed their own businesses, designed kick-ass products, consulted for Fortune 500 companies, built technology from concept to creation and innovated in industries where products were commoditized. We use our personal goals, experiences and interests to model our company values, objectives and services.
Our foundation in technology, fashion, automotive and digital lifestyle categories intrinsically makes working with our partners and connecting with their consumers simple. The key to our process is accessibility, honesty, transparency and communication. We expect the same from our partners and clients. We embrace collaboration and expect our designers, project managers and developers to work closely and directly with our clients. We LOVE design. Clean, functional, eye-catching, engaging, market-building design. Whether you're in the start-up phase, branding building or in the need of a new look, we will help make your presence differentiated, relevant and meaningful. We have managed marketing for major global brands and developed brand of our own. We specialize in innovative, effective solutions for your business.
READ MORE...
